articles.content:
The ex-fiancée of Lana Del Rey's new husband, Jeremy Dufrene, has well wishes for the newly married couple.
Kelli Welsh was engaged to Durfrene who wed Del Rey, 39, on Sept. 26 in Des Allemandes, Lo… [+2418 chars]
